This project is a modern JavaScript web app for NewsMapper_0.40. It uses Leaflet.js for mapping, overlays GDELT geojson points, and provides ESRI Gray and OSM base layers with a layer selector. No iframes are used for the map. Use best practices for modular, maintainable code.
